Traits.Name: Warmth Drain
Traits.Content: The Furnace Moth is drawn to sources of heat. Whenever it is within 30 feet of a fire source, it can move through difficult terrain without penalty.

Traits.Name: Ashen Wings
Traits.Content: The moth's wings create an ash cloud when it flies, granting it advantage on Stealth checks made in environments with ash or smoke.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Furnace Moth makes two attacks: one with its Ashen Mandibles and one with its Scorching Ember Spray.

Actions.Name: Ashen Mandibles
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is flammable, they must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or catch fire, taking an additional 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of their turn until they use their action to extinguish the flames.

Actions.Name: Scorching Ember Spray
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 7 (1d8 + 3) fire damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Fiery Flare
Actions.Content: The Furnace Moth releases a burst of intense heat in a 15-foot radius. Each creature in the area must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 30 (4d12 + 4) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. This ability can be used once per day.
